parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: The ID of the SQL result set export task. You can call the [GetDataExportOrderDetail](~~465911~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter. If you set this parameter to Null, no SQL result set export task is suspended.

parameters.name: OrderId
parameters.description: The ticket ID. You can call the [ListOrders](~~144643~~) operation to query the ticket ID.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The ID of the tenant.

> To view the ID of the tenant, go to the DMS console and move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner. For more information, see [View information about the current tenant](~~181330~~) section of the "Manage DMS tenants" topic.
